title: Kentucky must-see TV this season
text:
Manage Kentucky must-see TV this season John Calipari once said, "We don't just move the needle, we are the needle." This college basketball season has done nothing to dispute that notion. 
Kentucky coach John Calipari once said, "We don't just move the needle, we are the needle." 
Well, this college basketball season has done nothing to dispute that notion. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
After the Wildcats' matchup with Kansas last weekend became the most-watched college basketball game on ESPN this season, it gave Kentucky three of the top four most-watched and highest-rated games during the 2016-17 season, according to Sports Media Watch . 
Kentucky's thrilling 103-100 win over North Carolina at the CBS Sports Classic in December ranked No. 1, drawing a 2.2 rating and 3.62 million viewers. 
Kentucky-Kansas, which was the most-watched sporting event on TV aside from the Pro Bowl last weekend, is second (2.0, 3.35M), while Kentucky-Louisville (1.7, 2.72M) is fourth. 
Kentucky-Michigan State in the Champions Classic in November also ranked in the top 10.
